website_summaries.verdict: A PowerBar favorite based on taste, but its protein content is much lower than other bars.
pros: Provides on-the-go energy with a smaller 12g protein boost
Tasty, with a great texture that is neither too chewy nor too crumbly
cons: Loaded with sugar, at 12g per bar

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware these are not the 20g size and are ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware these are not the 20g size and are much smaller just know this when you are thinking about the price listed on the bars...
customer_reviews.author: The Digital Architect®

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My softball teams usually play double-headers and these bars are just the thing to keep my energy up for the long haul. The only caveat: You'll need to keep them cool or the chocolate coating will melt. But that's okay because these things taste even better when they're cold.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C. Nielsen, famous author

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly not happy
customer_reviews.text: I normally would not have any problems with this product, but I received it directly from the mailman and they were all melted and they’re about to expire in December. When I buy the products from the store the expiration date is usually a year from when I buy at least. I am not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas f. tinaro

customer_reviews.title: WAAYY better than the 20 gram of protein version
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of this bar for years, back to when it was known as Triple Threat. This is the 12 grams of protein version. I find it much superior to the 20 gram of protein variant in terms of taste and consistency.
customer_reviews.author: wuchmee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My local grocery store stopped stocking these. I was happy when I found them on Amazon. They are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Enloe

customer_reviews.title: Soccer athlete favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids as they play soccer. In between tournament games or after evening games, they don't want a meal but need something that's tasty and keeps them fueled up. They LOVE the taste of this bar - easily their favorite!
customer_reviews.author: K. Skaug

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good. I tend to eat them like candy bars ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost too good. I tend to eat them like candy bars but they definitely fill me up.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Melted :(
customer_reviews.text: Good but mine came in the mail melted so they were all misshapen
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Bad Amazon Prime Delivery Service
customer_reviews.text: The bars are fine and tasty. My son likes them for snacks at college. For The SECOND time in a row, Prime shipping was selected but not delivered. Take the $5 bonus option, apparently these will not deliver in time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: DoghouseBoy

customer_reviews.title: Very good bar
customer_reviews.text: Taste great. Takes the edge off when you start getting hungry. Helps me with my blood sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Best flavor power bar out there. Can’t find in the stores any more
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are the tastiest protein bars I've ever had! They're great for breakfast when I'm running late for work or for an after school snack.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money, should do everything I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really tasty and filling if you are in need of/want a healthier snack.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Melick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the product - I find it very good received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. I buy 2 boxes a month. Does have some sugar in them, but they fill me and truly taste like a candy bar!
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I would like a refund since these can’t be returned
customer_reviews.text: These PowerBars are my favorite go to protein bar that I have purchased for several years now. But this shipment is stale and the base of the bar is hard!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick energy boost. Bought previously from another local grocer at a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars and can't always find them in stores. Convenient purchase. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jgpCLS550

customer_reviews.title: but a little on the sweet side. Does help to curb your appetite
customer_reviews.text: They are very tasty, but a little on the sweet side. Does help to curb your appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sweet. Easy to eat, and a good mix of calories to protein to flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Wille

customer_reviews.title: yummmm
customer_reviews.text: Best protein bar we have ever eaten. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product but the people transporting this package have no ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product but the people transporting this package have no idea it's chocolate so they leave it by your porch in the summertime here in Phoenix. I know it's not too smart ordering this box during summer but they are addictive. I just need the exact time they drop said box on patio so I can grab ASAP, Not Amazons fault but those that transport for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner’s Fam

customer_reviews.title: its partially genetically engineered.
customer_reviews.text: Taste and texture are acceptable, however if you read the label under the flap is says its partially produced from genetic engineering. i will NOT be buying again and I cannot recommend. Over all I CANNOT recommend this product due to genetic engineering
customer_reviews.author: Edward Grey

customer_reviews.title: I have eaten these for over ten years.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. I love these. The flavor never gets old. They taste amazing. Give them a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda.b.rand

product_meta.title: PowerBar Protein Snack Bar, Peanut Butter Caramel, 50 Gram, 1.76 Ounce 15 count
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Peanut Butter Caramel| Size:15 CountIndulge with our PowerBar Protein Snack bar, offering a delicious snack-sized boost of high-quality protein. Powering through every step has never been tastier and it makes the perfect on-the-go pick-me-up in between games.
Available in 4 delicious flavors: Peanut Butter Caramel, Chocolate Peanut Butter Crisp, Caramel Nut Brownie, Peanut Butter Caramel Crisp.
feature_bullets: Each snack bar contains 12g protein, 3g fiber
Perfectly sized bar for sustained energy on the go, each bar is a good source of protein and fiber
Available in 3 delicious flavors: Chocolate Peanut Butter Crisp, Caramel Nut Brownie, Peanut Butter Caramel
No ARTIFICIAL flavors or preservatives, GLUTEN FREE

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
